title: Spotify-mini
overview: I dove into the world of UI design by creating a new look for the Spotify widget. Using Adobe XD, I focused on a clean and visually appealing aesthetic that complements the Spotify brand. My goal was to enhance the user experience (UX) by refining how information is displayed and making controls more intuitive..
content: Even small UI elements have a significant effect on how users interact with an app.  This project honed my skills in creating a compact yet functional design. The redesigned widget aims to provide a seamless and enjoyable Spotify experience right on the user's home screen.
